column17:
Product Description

His husky baritone invokes memories of a memorable night and the authority that he radiates sends people scurrying to do his bidding. Assuming power comes easily to him for he a born leader. He demands only the best not only from people around him but also from his own self pushing hard and further into the boundaries of possibility to achieve what no man has achieved yet. His slow yet steady climb into the creme de la creme of society and power is not without its scars ones that are well-hidden by the overwhelming presence of Number One from the celebrated house of Boss. The luxury Eau de Toilette is like a seductive companion who wraps her silken fingers over his heart and soul and keeps him enslaved to its wrenching aroma. Accords of artemisia green apple juniper basil grapefruit caraway bergamot and lemon create a luminous opening which bursts his day wide open in a flurry of freshness. Notes in the heart blend accords of honey lavender orris root jasmine sage with the floral tones of lily of the valley rose and geranium which instigates action and strength within him during a packed day. The dry down departs and leaves behind a trail with the accords of sandalwood amber patchouli musk oakmoss cedar and tobacco with just a hint of spicy cinnamon. The allure of Hugo Boss Number One is presented to world in a simple flacon through which the clear amber of the fragrance peeks out proving yet again that the most potent things come in the most innocuous of packages. Feel yourself go heady as the sweeping notes of Boss Number One takes over your senses.
